nodes.text: The L7 Liquidsilver light blaster pistol was a type of light blaster pistol manufactured by BlasTech Industries, and was a favored weapon by smugglers and outlaws. It shot straight, hit hard, and had a clean, tubular design that made it aesthetically pleasurable in minimalist ways. The design made it particularly easy to conceal within piping and conduits, and smugglers were known to stash them aboard their for emergency purposes.
